text:
LinkedIN is the place to be for B2B companies. The organic reach is crazy (Think Facebook 7 years ago). As you're company is quite established, you can use your own employee network to get your posts trending. This might result in quick results :sunglasses:

 What type of content to post is completely dependent on your industry. Test everything and see what type of posts get more shares and engagement. Once you crack something, use your company's money power to scale it quickly. 

Good luck Jonah! Great to see old school companies being open to new marketing mediums :fire:
